title-text.name: Change title text
title-text.description: Whether the title screen Geometry Dash text gets skewed.

title-buttons.name: Replace newgrounds with Geode
title-buttons.description: Whether the title screen newgrounds button gets replaced by Geode.

fire-in-the-hole.name: FIRE IN THE HOLE
fire-in-the-hole.description: Whether the play button on the title screen plays "FIRE IN THE HOLE" when clicked.

randomise-main-menu-bg.name: Randomise main menu ground + background
randomise-main-menu-bg.description: Whether the background and ground of the main menu gets randomised. This doesn't allow the loading screen to be changed. THIS OPTION WILL NOT WORK ON ANDROID!

force-bg.name: Force background ID
force-bg.description: Whether the background should be forced to be a specific one. Set to 0 to disable. THIS OPTION WILL NOT WORK ON ANDROID!

force-ground.name: Force ground ID
force-ground.description: Whether the ground should be forced to be a specific one. Set to 0 to disable.

move-player-to-corner.name: Move account icon into a corner
move-player-to-corner.description: Whether your account button is moved into a corner.

remove-player.name: Remove player in the main menu
remove-player.description: Whether the icons in the main menu get removed. Did you really have to click this?

remove-ground.name: Remove the ground in the main menu
remove-ground.description: Whether the ground in the main menu gets removed, like is that really not obvious??

align-daily.name: Align the daily chest
align-daily.description: This realigns the daily chest because it isn't normally for some reason.

move-daily.name: Move the daily chest to the bottom right
move-daily.description: ok but what do you think this setting does? just take a wild guess, what do <cy>you think?</c>

remove-exit-button.name: Remove exit button
remove-exit-button.description: Removes the exit button from the main menu, what did you expect?

replace-more-games-w-texture.name: Replace "More Games" with texture pack
replace-more-games-w-texture.description: Whether the More Games button on the title screen gets replaced with the texture pack selector. *Texture Loader must be installed.

hide-achievements-button.name: Hide the achievements button
hide-achievements-button.description: Whether the achievements button gets hidden on the title screen (what a surpise)

hide-stats-button.name: Hide the stats button
hide-stats-button.description: Whether the stats button gets hidden on the title screen (what a surpise!!)

change-geode-icon.name: Colourise the Geode icon
change-geode-icon.description: Whether the geode icon gets colourful! See issue #19 at https://github.com/undefined06855/GDTweaks/issues/19.

remove-exclamation.name: Remove Geode exclamation mark
remove-exclamation.description: Tired of geode benig angry all the time? Well now you don't have to be.

map-packs.name: Remove the Map Packs button (HIGHLY RECOMMENDED)
map-packs.description: Whether the map pack button gets removed. Replace map packs with Hall Of Fame must be disabled!

map-packs-hof.name: Replace the Map Packs button with Hall Of Fame
map-packs-hof.description: Whether the map pack button gets replaced with the Hall Of Fame

move-betterinfo.name: Move BetterInfo button
move-betterinfo.description: Whether the BetterInfo button gets moved into the corner. *BetterInfo must be installed.

garage-bg-remove.name: Remove icon kit's icon selector background
garage-bg-remove.description: Whether the background behind the icons in the icon kit should be removed.

garage-lock-tap-remove.name: Remove "Tap lock for more info!" message
garage-lock-tap-remove.description: There's no way you actually needed to know what this does.

fix-joystick-scroll.name: Fix joystick indicator
fix-joystick-scroll.description: Whether the joystick indicator gets moved from behind other buttons.

remove-orbs.name: Remove the orbs label from levels
remove-orbs.description: Removes the orbs label from level lists (LevelCells). This (obviously) doesn't prevent you getting orbs in a level!

remove-chains.name: Remove chains from level end screen
remove-chains.description: Removes the chains at the top of the level end screen.

suppress-warnings.name: Suppress incompatibilty warnings
suppress-warnings.description: This doesn't make GDTweaks magically work with every mod! It just makes it silently fail, instead of showing a warning.
